author: ltheussl
msg: maven:makeRelativePath now checks if path is absolute and under basedir,
if it is not, path is returned.

author: rdonkin
msg: After some consideration removed the indexes. JCL isn't signed and so anyone using it in an applet would need to rejar and sign in any case. They can index at the same time. Probably safer this way.

author: jgallacher
msg: Corrected request.user doc - it is no longer read-only.
